夜更けて: (よふけて) - late at night; deep in the night
夜更し: (よふかし) - staying up late; keeping late hours; sitting up late at night; nighthawk
夜桜: (よざくら) - cherry trees at evening
夜業: (やぎょう) - night work; night shift
夜歩き: (よあるき) - walking around at night
夜気: (やき) - night air; stillness of night; cool evening
夜泊まり: (よどまり) - night mooring (for a boat); sleeping away for the night (esp. in a red light district)
夜泊り: (よどまり) - night mooring (for a boat); sleeping away for the night (esp. in a red light district)
夜泣き: (よなき) - crying (of an infant) at night; baby colic
夜涼: (やりょう) - cool evening air; cooling oneself outside during the summer
夜深い: (よぶかい) - (staying) up late at night
夜濯ぎ: (よすすぎ) - washing clothes at night (during the height of the summer)
夜目がきく: (よめがきく) - to see well in the dark; to have good night vision
夜目が利く: (よめがきく) - to see well in the dark; to have good night vision
夜目にも明るい: (よめにもあかるい) - bright even in the dark; clearly visible at night
夜目遠目: (よめとおめ) - (yoji) seen in the dark or at a distance; (a woman) looking prettier when seen in the dark or at a distance
夜目遠目笠の内: (よめとおめかさのうち) - expression used to depict a woman who is attractive primarily when it's dark out, she's far away, or her face is partially hidden by a bamboo hat
夜直: (やちょく) - night duty; night shift
夜籠り: (よごもり) - the dead of night; praying all night in a shrine or temple
夜糞峰榛: (ヨグソミネバリ) - Japanese cherry birch (Betula grossa)
夜色: (やしょく) - shades of night; night scene
夜蛾: (ヤガ) - owlet moth (members of the family Noctuidae); noctuid
夜行: (やぎょう) - walking around at night; night train; night travel
夜行バス: (やこうバス) - overnight bus; night bus
夜行便: (やこうびん) - overnight flight; red-eye flight
夜襲: (やしゅう) - night attack; nocturnal assault
夜見の国: (よみのくに) - hades; realm of the dead; the next world
夜見世: (よみせ) - night stall; night shop; night fair
夜話: (よばなし) - night chat/tale told at night; (よばなし only) evening tea party (starting around 6 pm); (やわ only) book of informal essays
夜逃げ: (よにげ) - night flight (without paying); skipping out by night; moonlight flit
夜這い: (よばい) - creeping at night into a woman's bedroom; stealing into a girl's bedroom at night to make love; sneaking visit
夜通し: (よどおし) - all night; throughout the night
夜遅く: (よるおそく) - late at night; at a late hour
夜道: (よみち) - street at night; making a night journey
夜郎自大: (やろうじだい) - (yoji) throwing one's weight around in a small group without knowing one's real worth in a larger world outside
夜間中学: (やかんちゅうがく) - evening middle school
夜間営業: (やかんえいぎょう) - open at night
夜間外出禁止令: (やかんがいしゅつきんしれい) - curfew
夜間発送電報: (やかんはっそうでんぽう) - telegram sent at night (usually to make use of a reduced rate)
夜間着陸訓練: (やかんちゃくりくくんれん) - night landing practice; NLP
夜間預金々庫: (やかんよきんきんこ) - night-deposit safe
夜間預金金庫: (やかんよきんきんこ) - night-deposit safe
夜間高校: (やかんこうこう) - evening high school
夜闇: (よやみ) - dead of night; shades of night; black of night
夜陰: (やいん) - shades of evening; dead of night
夜陰に乗じて: (やいんにじょうじて) - under cover of night
夜露死苦: (よろしく) - (夜露死苦 is slang) well/properly/suitably; best regards/please remember me/please treat me favorably (favourably)/please take care of; (as ...よろしく) just like .../as though one were ...; (as よろしく…べし) by all means/of course
夜食: (やしょく) - supper; night meal; late-night snack; "fourth meal"; midnight snack
夜香木: (ヤコウボク) - night jessamine (Cestrum nocturnum); night jasmine; lady of the night; queen of the night
